server
Class UserHandler

java.lang.Object
  server.UserHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class UserHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Handles one TCP Connection with one User. Establishes the connection in own thread User can be anonymous but has the Chance to log himself in. If the user logged in the Server gets the User from the Server. If the Connection is closed logs out the user automatically

Version:
10-12-2013
Author:
Daniel Reichmann

          Creates the UserHandler and starts the Connection
